item.title: RavenSword
item.dc:creator: @qadh qadh
item.description:
@qadh wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:14, topic:335311”][quote author=Darque Star link=topic=431707.msg3169530#msg3169530 date=1270322414]
the thing is to all of you people is, you just tell me
“your model sucks”
and thats the end of your post.
i ask for suggestions.
like what to do to make it better, or do i just suck that bad that there will never be anyway to make it any better?

can you guys give me a link of a tutorial or youtube video showing how to use prims?

and reyx; sorry, i hadn’t realized.

and another thing; this was not traced at all, completely freehand >.<
[/quote]
Just a heads up, around here “freehand’ing” is known as the trace method. You’re right though, nobody here knows how to criticize properly, they feel “you suck” is going to make you better for some reason. Learn to accept it and only listen to what those of us who know how to criticize have to say.[/quote]
I thought my advice was pretty good

Read full topic

item.title: RavenSword
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

Darquestar…You have to learn what moparscape forums are like…When someone says your model stinks, just do one of two things…
1.) Ignore it
2.) Thank them to surprise them, then shank them in the kidney when they are sleeping
2.) Ask them why they think it is bad, then use their further comments to impress them with another model that is great.

Read full topic

see? You have multiple people telling you things and what, are you just gonna flame them 2?
OT:Look how old the last 2 rs pictures are
Old rune models, old log models, GP all yellow, and old key models
And the second one is just ancient. Like no spells whatsoever…

item.title: RavenSword
item.dc:creator: @qadh qadh
item.description:
@qadh wrote:

Alright I have to agree this model is in all entirety bad but has potential, the blade is not stragiht and the hilt is at a dumb looking angle so try to make it better and believe me theyre right prims are the way to go. I used to have the same mindset as you so dont worry prims are also easier

Read full topic

item.title: RavenSword
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“Darque Star, post:5, topic:335311”]Reyx, i see no models posted by you.
give me links to yours.
Every single model i do is “horrible” to you.
So if your so good, let me see em.
i found some models of yours.
all you fucking do is put textures on them.
good job, you know how to texture, but too bad runescape doesnt read textures.
now im gonna use your sig.
You Sir, are a fucking moron.[/quote]
Hate to break it to you, but its shit. Dont flame somebody who dislikes your model. You should accept his comment and ask how it can be made better. Congratulations for being yet another person to give us decent people on moparscape a bad name.

Read full topic

item.title: RavenSword
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Darque Star, post:5, topic:335311”]Reyx, i see no models posted by you.
give me links to yours.
Every single model i do is “horrible” to you.
So if your so good, let me see em.
i found some models of yours.
all you fucking do is put textures on them.
good job, you know how to texture, but too bad runescape doesnt read textures.
now im gonna use your sig.
You Sir, are a fucking moron.[/quote]
You sir, are a fucking moron.
.Dat files don’t read texture.
Runescape reads texture.
I’ll give examples to make u stfu
1.Texture on the wall

2.Texture on tables

3.Texture in path

So learn your facts retard
.dat files can’t read texture
so jagex obviously uses something else
Also, All you do is trace. Use primitives. Your models will come out nicer, ask anyone here.
So don’t even try to put yourself on a higher level then me when you’re still tracing
My models are 90% primitives, 10% freehand (not tracing).

Read full topic
